name: Mr. Pen Automatic Travel Umbrella - Green, Compact, Windproof for Rain
short_description: Mr. Pen windproof travel umbrella comes in an elegant shade of green, making it a stylish accessory that complements various personal styles and preferences. With its three-fold design, this umbrella is both lightweight and portable, easily fitting into bags and briefcases for on-the-go protection from the elements. Equipped with an automatic opening mechanism, the umbrella can be deployed quickly and effortlessly with just one hand, perfect for sudden downpours. Built with 9 durable ribs, this umbrella is designed to withstand heavy rain and wind, ensuring you stay dry and comfortable during inclement weather. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, and the attached wrist strap ensures the umbrella stays secure, making it an ideal companion for daily commutes and travel.

name: Anntrue Windproof Travel Umbrella, Auto Open Close Lightweight Compact Portable Backpack Folding Umbrella, Perfect for Car, Purse, Men and Women (Black)
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT, PORTABLE, COMPACT TRAVEL UMBRELLA: Measuring just 11.6" long and weighing less than 0.9 lb (other brands weigh 1 lb or more), our small folding umbrella fits perfectly in your purse, briefcase, backpack, car door, and even in pocket. With a wider canopy (46") than most typical travel umbrellas, Anntrue umbrella provides full coverage for you and your loved ones when facing unpredictable weather. UPGRADED & ULTIMATE WIND AND RAIN PROTECTION: Our 8 reinforced fiberglass ribs and sturdy metal frame make it highly durable, and capable of withstanding even the toughest weather conditions. The sturdy canopy is designed to invert itself and bounce back to its original shape when meeting heavy winds. Coated with Superior Teflon, our travel umbrella repels water effectively and dries quickly. ONE-HAND AUTO OPEN AND CLOSE FUNCTION: No more fumbling around to open the umbrella before you're drenched. With a touch of the button, the umbrella springs open quickly and when you want to close it, simply push the button again. You don’t have to struggle with opening or closing your umbrella in heavy rain especially when you get into/out of a car, building, or tent. THE STRONGEST, RELIABLE, PRACTICAL UMBRELLA: We need to be protected when Mother Nature is angry. Made of thick, high-quality material with substantial weight, It protects you from heavy rain and wind. Our UPF 30+ Teflon coating effectively shields you from harmful rays on sunny days. Wherever you go, be prepared to take a reliable compact travel umbrella with you. HASSLE-FREE AFTER-SALES SERVICE: Your satisfaction is our #1 concern. If it doesn’t meet your expectations in any way, just email us and we will promptly replace it or 100% refund you without any questions asked or any additional cost. You are protected for life from the rain, sleet, and snow, through our hassle-free replacement program.
